about_text: TrainRail Hackathon Brasil is the Brazilian phase of the first global Rail Hackathon that is aimed at railway companies as an initiative of the Union Internationale des Chemins de fer (UIC). This hackathon offers participants and rail transport enthusiasts the opportunity to imagine the future and develop solutions so that rail operators can better cope with pandemic situations. The solutions sought can be applied in the different sectors of activities of these companies. The hackathon will include several themes and activities, such as: training, assistance on board trains and stations, maintenance workshops, management of suspected cases, communication and information, etc. The final competition at the international level will be in May 2022, as part of the World Congress on Training, Talent and Rail Development (WCRT).
